SamplingAlgorithms

Class RNDWalkMetroHastingsSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • SamplingAlgorithms.RNDWalkSampler
      • SamplingAlgorithms.RNDWalkMetroHastingsSampler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SampleMethod, TargetedSampleMethod

    public class RNDWalkMetroHastingsSampler
extends RNDWalkSampler
    Sampler implementing the metro-hastings version of the walk method as well as the Random sampling for mixing. Metro-Hastings biases the random walk to explore less degree-centric nodes. Random sampling only selects one node that's currently unselected and adds no connections. Connections are added based off where the walk goes, making a full graph sampling able to include only a proportion of the connections
    Author:
    MOREPOWER
